Posts.Content: I am so sorry you're going through this!  However, your question should be put to your oncologist not this forum.  We can offer comfort and practical assistance not medical advice! xx.  Report
Posts.Title: Can I take Garcinia Cambogia with Tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: I’ve put in quite a bit of weight since going through the menopause and have tried to loose weight with not much success. I’ve heard that Garcinia Cambogia tablets might help but not sure if I can take them with tamoxifen.  0 likes, 2 replies Report
Posts.Title: Can I take Garcinia Cambogia with Tamoxifen?
